tooltip.materials_integration.hold_shift: ยง7Hold Shift for more info
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line1: Can be placed as dirt-type blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line2: Used in Stonecutter for dirt-related materials
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line3: No Silk Touch or special crafting required for some variants
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line4: MineColonies builders and miners can process it directly
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line1: Can be placed as log-type blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line2: Acts as logs in crafting recipes
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line3: Used in Stonecutter for log processing
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line4: Most MineColonies artisans can craft with it
tooltip.materials_integration.planks.lin: Can be placed as plank-type blocks
Acts as planks in crafting recipes
Used in Stonecutter for wooden materials
MineColonies carpenters can craft nearly all wooden items with it
tooltip.materials_integration.rock.line1: Can be placed as stone brick blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.rock.line3: Used in Stonecutter for stone materials
tooltip.materials_integration.rock.line4: MineColonies stonemasons can process it directly
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line1: Can be placed as sand-type blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line2: Used in Stonecutter for sand, red sand, and gravel
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line4: MineColonies builders can craft sandstone directly
tooltip.materials_integration.stone.line: Can be placed as most stone-type blocks
Acts as cobblestone in crafting recipes
Used in Stonecutter for stone materials
MineColonies stonemasons can craft nearly all stone items with it
tooltip.materials_integration.fuel.line1: Crafted from agricultural waste, logs, or log resources
tooltip.materials_integration.fuel.line2: Also crafted with coal or charcoal
tooltip.materials_integration.waste.line: Crafted with leaves, weeds, or sticks
Also crafted with Farmer's Delight plant fiber and bark
Used to make paper and fuel resources
